Reviews.Title: Laptop stopped working. Wouldn't turn on!
Reviews.Author: MCB2058
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop and two weeks after I bought it, it wouldn't turn on. Nothing would happen when I pressed the power button. It seemed to be dead. It must have been defective. I returned it to amazon for a refund!

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more $ on something faster
Reviews.Author: James Johnston
Reviews.Content: This computer is somewhat slow. I even upgraded the memory. The audio when hooked to auxiliary speakers is not very good. My wife has a Toshiba with less memory and it smokes this one.

Reviews.Title: Came with defective
Reviews.Author: Tada T.
Reviews.Content: Battery is not charging.I did this below, but still it did not work.· Change Power Plan to Saver· Turn off laptop· Unplug the mains cable. Now your comp is totally unpowered.· Press start button and hold it for 10-15 secs· Plug the mains back in and boot the computer· Insert the battery back on.

Reviews.Title: I liked it but...
Reviews.Author: Millette Miller
Reviews.Content: I liked the computer but I received a bad battery with my purchase. Never heard of that before but it was quickly replaced by Toshiba. I received my new battery within days of ordering the replacement.

Reviews.Title: the battery was dead
Reviews.Author: hoagiealex
Reviews.Content: The battery only lasted about a week. Now I have to return it or try and get a new battery. very upsetting.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 sucks
Reviews.Author: Ikeisha Niles
Reviews.Content: Apart from windows 8 which I have every intention of removing, havent had many complaints. it is a bit slow and sticks when streaming sometimes ( what you're seeing and what they're saying dont match up). The mousepad stopped working after 4 days so I had to get an external mouse.
